item.title: Favourite 'nixisms
item.description: dotfiles There are many ways and tools to manage your dotfiles, having tried several, I like to use good ‘ol GNU stow. (why is there no Gnu emoji?? its a different form of a bull, sh*t) In my dotfiles repo there is a stow config for different environments (home,work)/ Cloning [a project that setup good file conventions]() that has good file naming conventions for stow and git helps as well.
